description: React component 'StoryDetail' for displaying and editing a story thread, including functionality to fetch story data, add paragraphs, and request AI suggestions/edits.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches story and paragraph data based on story ID, updates state accordingly.

methods.name: addParagraph
methods.description: Posts a new paragraph to the story and updates the paragraphs list.

methods.name: askAiSuggestion
methods.description: Requests an AI-generated paragraph suggestion based on current story context.

methods.name: askAiEdit
methods.description: Requests an AI-refined version of the current input paragraph.
